channel.title: I'm so dumb
channel.description:
I swear i had a memory loss, i just got back to school off vacation and the teacher gave me an assignment.. It says that it wants us to find out how much these prices will cost each, and how much we sell for... e.g Bacon Rashers @ $13 (15 rashers)
But then it asks how much 1 rasher would cost...
So you would divide it, if im correct, and then how the hell would you find out how much you are going to sell for??

item.title: I'm so dumb
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

The Chubby Bunny:

I’m not a hyprocrite

(For Reference:)

hypocrite • noun a person who is given to hypocrisy. hypocrisy • noun (pl. hypocrisies) the practice of claiming to have higher standards or beliefs than is the case.
The Chubby Bunny:

Omfg, all you fucking do is flame people.

The Chubby Bunny:

You’re an enormous faggot who needs to die in a fire.

This is what Unhandled was referring to. While the context isn’t exactly the same (you claim that it is “all [he] fucking do[es]”), the gist of the statement is the same - you accuse abraham2119 of being a person who does nothing but flame, while flaming him in your post with the last quote of yours i have. By the definition, this means that you are in fact a hypocrite, unless there are some sort of extenuating circumstances. But regardless of whether or not you are a hypocrite, both flaming and posting unnecessarily are against the rules, offences that you have broken.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm so dumb
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:9, topic:328593”][quote author=The Chubby Bunny link=topic=424992.msg3122065#msg3122065 date=1265608507]

Then yes, it is your fault for not writing the assignment down or at least for not having the mental capacity required to remember a simple task like this one.

Omfg, all you fucking do is flame people. It amazes that you haven’t got warned yet. You’re an enormous faggot who needs to die in a fire.
[/quote]
Hypocrite.[/quote]
I’m not a hyprocrite, HE flames people, I just make unnecessary posts.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm so dumb
item.dc:creator: @jamesn jamesn
item.description:
@jamesn wrote:

I knew it was divided by that bit,
but i do remember this…
Teacher said that we have to “cater” for an amount of people, he said easiest to pick “100” as the amount, and theres more too it. Like theres a range of “eaters”.
70% - light eaters
20% - normal eaters
10% - heavy eaters
= 100%
We had to find out what was each one. But first he said to work it out normally, and there was more then “bacon rashers” to it… I don’t understand it at all…
I’m so behind!! It makes no sense right?

Read full topic

item.title: I'm so dumb
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

13/15 = $0.86 each

The assignment had to have give you more information than simply “find out how much you are going to sell it for”.

Read full topic
